This blog entry is very difficult to create and altered all of my plans for the future.

We have twelve years to throw our economies to rubble, change our culture and mindsets and heal the planet as per IPCC report by UN on climate change.

Professor Guy R. McPherson, an ecology and evolutionary biologist and american scientist that I happen to check and contact with in the interweb told me that there is no hope…less than eight years until we get extinct. This is Professor McPherson’s report… quite a long read.. a pretty bold claim but after reading and watching his presentations..he has a very strong case for such estimate.

The economy that is solely based on carbon baaed fossil fuels since the 1750s had done enough damage to last for centuries to come..Not to mention the plastic / garbage we accumulate..

No technology has ever been built yet to remove carbon in the atmosphere effectively without soaking up too much energy..

BTW, for climate change deniers..97% of leading scientists all over the world agree on this. A definitive truth.

Earth is a freaking masterpiece, luckily not too far or near the sun, has the right orbit to trigger manageable seasons..enough water to generate diversity of life.. Our existence as humans in the last 200 years had altered this balance..

I still believe the human collective can still make a difference if we let go of this shit economy that we built. This economy that rendered us powerless to the need of material stuff and powerful enough to damage the earth’s lungs.. namely the forests, oceans, and all forms of life.. If we don’t put the planet above everything we do..we are done for..

I just find it funny, amazing and stupid that we caused our own extinction.. I do accept that death is inevitable but extinction was hard for me to consume..mixed ideas popping in to my head..

I recommend anyone who will read this post to reflect on how precious each second, each day, each moment is..love all forms of life..and don’t harm the planet much more..we already reached the tipping point..

We are in the age of the Antropocene, the sixth mass extinction and caused by us stupid humans..
